C

check_login(String, String) - Method in class com.example.app0.DBHelper
 
close_connection() - Method in class com.example.app0.DBHelper
closes the database connection it is important to use this to reduce resource usage
com.example.app0 - package com.example.app0
 

D

DBHelper - Class in com.example.app0
The DBHelper class connects to a database and has some methods to run queries This class was written with mysql in mind and will need modification to work with another database The address of the database is hardcoded as this should not change often and now we don't need to keep sending it when we connect this should probably be changed in future
DBHelper(String, String) - Constructor for class com.example.app0.DBHelper
Constructor for the DBHelper class

G

get_con() - Method in class com.example.app0.DBHelper
 

R

reset_connection() - Method in class com.example.app0.DBHelper
closes and reopens the connection to the database intended to be used in conjunction with set_address()

S

set_address(String) - Method in class com.example.app0.DBHelper
overwrites the default database connection string format of the string should be jdbc:db_provider:db_address/db_name only use this if you know what you're doing
